info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 4:51PM CDT until May 01 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PECOS...EASTERN REEVES...SOUTHEASTERN WARD AND CENTRAL CRANE COUNTIES... At 451 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Grandfalls, or 21 miles south of Monahans, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Grandfalls, Royalty, Imperial, Coyanosa, Imperial Reservoir and Cordona Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for western and southwestern Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
